attributes.action: Cutting corporation tax for SMEs will stimulate growth.
attributes.additional_details:
"It is well known that small firms are the engine room of the UK economy and the job creators in the country" Federation of Small Businesses Press Release July 23, 2010

We should have tax brackets for different sized companies phased in very gradually. Companies with a turn over less than £1 million should have a corporation tax of 12.5 - 15%. this would help create a vast amount of jobs and kick start the economy.
